query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `temporalAnalysisResults` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `configId` INT NOT NULL,
  `analysisDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `periodLabel` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `totalEmployeesAnalyzed` INT NOT NULL,
  `averagePirScore` INT,
  `averageGoalCompletion` INT,
  `average360Score` INT,
  `trendsData` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `significantChanges` TEXT,
  `topPerformers` TEXT,
  `needsAttention` TEXT,
  `previousPeriodComparison` TEXT,
  `departmentComparison` TEXT,
  `organizationalComparison` TEXT,
  `improvementRate` INT,
  `declineRate` INT,
  `stableRate` INT,
  `insights` TEXT,
  `recommendations` TEXT,
  `status` ENUM('processando', 'concluido', 'erro') DEFAULT 'processando' NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` TEXT,
  `generatedBy` INT,
  `generatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `processingTimeSeconds` INT,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `employeeTemporalSnapshots` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `employeeId` INT NOT NULL,
  `analysisResultId` INT,
  `snapshotDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `periodLabel` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `positionId` INT,
  `departmentId` INT,
  `pirScore` INT,
  `pirAnswers` TEXT,
  `pirCompletionDate` DATETIME,
  `totalGoals` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `completedGoals` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `goalCompletionRate` INT,
  `score360` INT,
  `evaluation360Data` TEXT,
  `competenciesData` TEXT,
  `videoAnalysisScore` INT,
  `videoAnalysisData` TEXT,
  `changeFromPrevious` INT,
  `changeType` ENUM('melhoria', 'declinio', 'estavel'),
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:

  `processingTimeSeconds` INT,

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `employeeTemporalSnapshots` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `employeeId` INT NOT NULL,
  `analysisResultId` INT,
  `snapshotDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,
  `periodLabel` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `positionId` INT,
  `departmentId` INT,
  `pirScore` INT,
  `pirAnswers` TEXT,
  `pirCompletionDate` DATETIME,
  `totalGoals` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `completedGoals` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `goalCompletionRate` INT,
  `score360` INT,
  `evaluation360Data` TEXT,
  `competenciesData` TEXT,
  `videoAnalysisScore` INT,
  `videoAnalysisData` TEXT,
  `changeFromPrevious` INT,
  `changeType` ENUM('melhoria', 'declinio', 'estavel'),
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
